summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of $580,000.00 of a loan in the sum of $1,000,000.00 authorized by Ordinance No. 23220 and voted at the general election held in the City of Seattle on Tuesday, March 8, 1910, under and pursuant to said ordinance; providing for the issuance, deliver and details of said bonds, and providing for the payment of principal and interest thereof.
